item.title: Catherine add a quote by James Thurber
item.description: "Why do you have to be a nonconformist like everybody else?" -- James Thurber

item.title: Catherine add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "There are many humorous things in the world; among them, the white man's notion that he is less savage than the other savages." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "My books are water; those of the great geniuses is wine. Everybody drinks water." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I've lived through some terrible things in my life, some of which actually happened." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Nothing ever fatigues me, but doing what I do not like." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Life seems but a quick succession of busy nothings." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Catherine add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "The most wasted of all days is one without laughter." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Catherine add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Catherine add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "Unbeing dead isn't being alive." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: Catherine add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best day and night to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight and never stop fighting." -- e.e. cummings
